title: Estimating Parameters: Free Throws
question_text: Suppose an athlete shoots $200\text{ free throws}$ and makes $160$ of them. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.text: This athlete is an 80 % 80 % free-throw shooter.
A sample of 100 free throws 100 free throws would be more effective in estimating the athlete’s true free-throw percentage.
The athlete’s true free-throw percentage is probably somewhere near 80 % 80 % .
The athlete could easily make fewer than 100 free throws 100 free throws in the next set of 200 free throw attempts 200 free throw attempts .
No reasonable conclusions can be drawn from this data.
